original_title: Judgment Day: The Ellie Nesler Story
overview: Fact-based story about a Bible-quoting woman who in 1990 murdered a camp counselor, whom she learned molested her 7 year old son. Seeking revenge, she turns to murder when she learns the man had previously been convicted of the same crime in 1983 and got off with probation.
tagline: There's nothing stronger or more deadly than a mother's love.
title: Judgment Day: The Ellie Nesler Story
